help.desc: Displays a list of available commands

welcome.desc: Displays a personalized welcome message to the user.

content.message2: To learn more about me and my projects, type:

clear.desc: Clears the terminal screen and resets the display.

about.desc: Displays detailed information about me and my interests.

content.title: About Me
content.info1: I am passionate about computer science, particularly game and application development.
content.info2: Cybersecurity is my primary career goal, and I love exploring digital security challenges.
content.info3: I am currently in the final year of high school, specializing in technology and programming.
content.info4: Outside of coding, I'm a big fan of manga and anime, which inspire my creativity.

skills.desc: Displays the technical skills and tools I am proficient in.

contact.desc: Displays contact information to get in touch with me.
